title: GitHub Pull Request Message
description: Message reporting that a GitHub pull request has occurred

organization.description: The GitHub `organization` which had an event.

repository.description: The GitHub `repository` which had an event.

installationId.description: The installation which had an event.

action.description: The GitHub `action` which triggered an event.

eventId.description: The GitHub webhook deliveryId. Extracted from the header 'X-GitHub-Delivery'

details.description: Metadata describing the pull request (for version 0)

body.description: The raw body of github event (for version 1)

tasks_for.description: The type of the event (for version 1)

branch.description: The head ref of the event (for version 1)
